text:
e="preserve">Ved Prakash Marwah (15 September 1934 – 5 June 2020) was an Indian politician. He was Governor of Manipur from 1999 to 2003, Mizoram from 2000 to 2001 and Jharkhand from 2003 to 2004. He was born in Peshawar, British India.
Marwah died on 5 June 2020 from lung disease-related problems at a hospital in Goa, India at the age of 85.
